From @NWSHouston: A line of strong thunderstorms is heading east towards Houston at 25 mph.

text: This is why shutting down & restarting browser works to display the updates with the existing code. Likewise, holding shift and hitting refresh to force reload works. But if people hit refresh on open browser session like I was doing, it reloads from cache. I've seen this before.
text_html: This is why shutting down & restarting browser works to display the updates with the existing code. Likewise, holding shift and hitting refresh to force reload works. But if people hit refresh on open browser session like I was doing, it reloads from cache. I've seen this before.

text: I figured out the issue, it's the html page code. Your current code defaults for a browser refresh to pull from local cache, so it doesn't display the updates. You need to add a bit of code to force a reload on refresh, see here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26818091/force-browser-to-reload-index-htm …
text_html: I figured out the issue, it's the html page code. Your current code defaults for a browser refresh to pull from local cache, so it doesn't display the updates.
